title: Sam Ciaramitaro from Drain
itunes:title: Sam Ciaramitaro from Drain
description:
Drain seems to be everywhere and now we get to know Sam Ciaramitaro (the vocalist) a lot better. Sam and I had a fun conversation about growing up in San Pedro, hustle and why he never likes to wear pants. Let's do this!
